pages.text: A $(item)Beacon$() is a block that projects a light beam skyward and can provide status effects such as $(thing)Speed$(), $(thing)Jump Boost$(), $(thing)Haste$(), $(thing)Regeneration$(), $(thing)Resistance$(), or $(thing)Strength$() to nearby $(thing)Players$() when activated with a pyramid.
There are four possible pyramid heights. More levels make more powers available. $(br)Can be built with $(item)Iron/Gold/Emerald/Diamond/Netherite$() blocks.
